Reviews.Title: “credit card fraud !”
Reviews.Author: touftitrit
Reviews.Content: stayed city hotel week ok brilliant bad 2 months hotel reused credit card charged 709 euros nightmare started manager hotel refuses refund money agrees invalid charge mistake refund money 48 hours third month am waiting refund hotel closed bookingcom websites realise mistake fraud warned
